1.0.0.name: wordpress/ashop-commerce
1.0.0.description:
AShop Commerce lets you use an AShop shopping cart from WordPress to publish information from the AShop database in WordPress posts, pages or sidebars.

A copy of the ecommerce software AShop from AShop Software is required to use this plugin.

Provides widgets for product categories, top sellers, latest additions, shopping mall shops and autoresponder signup. Also gives you a set of shortcodes that can be used to publish information about products anywhere in your posts or pages, for example to show the thumbnail image, the name or the price of a product.

If you store your AShop admin panel login in your WordPress user profile, you will be able to quickly login from a menu item in the WordPress admin panel.

This plugin overrides the user registration in WordPress to automatically register new users as customers in AShop as well. Because of this, it will most likely not work well with other plugins that customi
